property.name: Day
property.descrip: The day of the month. The valid values for this member are 1 through 31.

property.name: Hour
property.descrip: The hour. The valid values for this member are 0 through 23.

property.name: Minute
property.descrip: The minute. The valid values for this member are 0 through 59.

property.name: Month
property.descrip: The month. The valid values for this member are 1 through 12 where 1 = January and 12 = December.

property.name: Second
property.descrip: The second. The valid values for this member are 0 through 59.

property.name: StructTmMonth
property.descrip: The month. The valid values for this member are 0 through 11 where 0 = January and 11 = December.

property.name: StructTmYear
property.descrip: The year represented as the number of years since 1900.

property.name: Utc
property.descrip: _TRUE_ if this is a UTC time, otherwise _FALSE_ if this is a local time.

method.name: DeSerialize
method.descrip: Loads the date/time with a string having the format as produced by the Serialize method, which is a string of SPACE separated integers containing (in this order) year, month, day, hour, minutes, seconds, and a UTC flag having the value of 1/0.

method.name: Serialize
method.descrip: Serializes the date/time to a us-ascii string that can be imported at a later time via the DeSerialize method. The format of the string returned by this method is not intended to match any published standard. It is formatted to a string with SPACE separated integers containing (in this order) year, month, day, hour, minutes, seconds, and a UTC flag having the value of 1/0.
